description: Detects when a person is mirroring another so closely that it creates an illusion of deep connection, often used in narcissistic or manipulative patterns. Flags false resonance created through mimicry.

variables.F(t): Flattery or emotional syncing (e.g. 'you’re the only one who gets it')
variables.D(t): Distinction expression (e.g. healthy disagreement, unique voice)

response: This feels familiar, maybe even comforting—but is it *you* being seen, or just your reflection? Try asking something unexpected, or break the rhythm to test its truth.
